item.title: compileGSIonUbuntu1404
item.description: ###compile GSI in Ubunut 14.04### GSI was tried to compile in Ubuntu 12.04, but ended with failure. GSI requieres Gfortran 4.7 and above, ubunut 12.04 repostory is updated upto 4.6, so ubunut has to upgraded from 12.04 to 14.04 to have gfortran 4.7. Due to this Server was upghraded from Ubuntu 12.04 to 14.04 and compiled WRFV4.3.1 and WPS 4.3.1 in it. It was by Gfortran 4.8.2, Netcdf 4.1.3, and other necssary libraries such as libpng, zlib and jasper as per apt-get method.
